snippet.title: Superfighters Deluxe Gameplay 2020-07-07 #5
snippet.description:
Attention superfighters! It is now only 1 hour left of the STEAM SUMMER SALE! Grab the game at 44% off! https://store.steampowered.com/app/855860/Superfighters_Deluxe/

Superfighters Deluxe is a unique action game that combines brawling, shooting and platforming in dynamic sandboxy 2D levels. Lots of weapons and fun gameplay systems interlock to create absurd action-movie chaos.
